00023 #include <stdio.h>
00024 #include <avr/io.h>
00025 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00026 #include "usart.h"
00027 
00029 #define OCR0_1MS        14
00030 
00032 void init_usart(void)
00033 {
00034         //Init USART to 115.2kBaud at 14.7456 MHz (communication bus)
00035         usart0_init(15);
00036         fdevopen((void*)usart0_transmit, (void*)usart0_receive_loopback);
00037 }
00038 
00043 void init_timer_0(void)
00044 {
00045    TCCR0 = 0;
00046    TIFR  |= (1<<OCIE0)|(1<<TOIE0);
00047    TIMSK |= (1<<TOIE0)|(1<<OCIE0);         /* enable output compare interrupt */
00048    TCCR0  = (1<<WGM01)|(1<<CS02)|(1<<CS01)|(1<<CS00); /* CTC, prescale = 1024 */
00049    TCNT0  = 0;
00050    OCR0   = OCR0_1MS;                     /* match in aprox 1 ms,  */
00051 }
00052 
00054 void init_ports(void)
00055 {
00056         DDRA = 0xFF;
00057         DDRB = 0x0F;
00058         DDRC = 0xFC;
00059         DDRD = 0x0E;
00060         DDRF = 0x30;
00061         
00062         //Trigger on any edge
00063         EICRB = (0<<ISC61) | (1<<ISC60);
00064         EIMSK |= (1<<INT6);
00065 }
